Package Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.model.weapons.rangedweapons

Class RangedWeapon

java.lang.Object
Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.model.weapons.Weapon
Tekiz._DPSCalculator._DPSCalculator.model.weapons.rangedweapons.RangedWeapon
public class RangedWeapon extends Weapon
Represents a generic ranged weapon that the user can add to their loadout.

  • Constructor Details

    • RangedWeapon

      @Autowired public RangedWeapon(String weaponName, WeaponType weaponType, DamageType damageType, HashMap<Integer,Double> weaponDamageByLevel, int apCost, double attackSpeed, int criticalBonus, int magazineSize, int fireRate, int range, int accuracy, int projectileCount, int rangedPenalty, double reloadTime, double attackDelay, Receiver receiver)
      The constructor for a RangedWeapon object.
      Parameters:
      weaponName - The name of the weapon. The user will be able to see the given value
      weaponType - The type of weapon. This is used for various Modifier conditions.
      damageType - The damage type the weapon afflicts. This is used for various Modifier conditions.
      weaponDamageByLevel - A HashMap of the weapons level (Integer) and the base damage it provides (Double).
      apCost - The Integer value that it costs to use the weapon.
      attackSpeed - The Double value of the speed the weapon fires at. Different weapons will have varying rate of fires.
      criticalBonus - The Integer value of the bonus to critical damage the weapon provides.Primarily used for VATS.
      magazineSize - The maximum Integer value the weapon can fire before needing to be reloaded.
      fireRate - The Double value of the weapon's rate of fire.
      range - The Integer value of the weapon's range. This affects the performance of the weapon, decreasing at further ranges.
      accuracy - The Integer value of the weapon's accuracy. This affects the performance of the weapon, decreasing at further ranges.
      projectileCount - The amount of projectiles the weapon fires per attack.
      rangedPenalty - The damage reduction penalty if the target is outside the weapons range.
      reloadTime - The time it takes for a weapon to be usable once all bullets have been fired.
      attackDelay - The time it takes for a weapon to be usable between each attack.
      receiver - The Receiver mod slot of the weapon.

  • Method Details

    • getBaseDamage

      public double getBaseDamage(int weaponLevel)
      Description copied from class: Weapon
      Retrieves the Double value of the damage the weapon provides.
      Specified by:
      getBaseDamage in class Weapon
      Parameters:
      weaponLevel - The level used to retrieve the provided damage value by corresponding weaponDamageByLevel key.
      Returns:
      The weaponDamageByLevel corresponding damage value.

    • setMod

      public void setMod(RangedMod rangedMod)
      A method that is used to make modifications to the weapon.
      Parameters:
      rangedMod - The modification that the user wishes to make. The mod slot it affects is determined by the class of the RangedMod object.
